intro: I'm a software developer with a passion for web development.
I love to work with TypeScript and Angular. In my private life, the computer never stands still, because programming is not only my vocation it's more my passion.
You can have a look at some of my work here.
about: I'm a Full Stack developer from Germany.
I currently work as a software developer at an IT service provider. I am also a trainer for upcoming developers.
My main focus is building fast, accessible, and beautiful websites that users enjoy.
💬 Ask me about **JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, Docker**
